message.content:
cs.NI, cs.RO, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.CV

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses wireless sensor networks and their applications in rescue operations and monitoring. 
2. cs.RO (Robotics) - The paper proposes a method for 3D localization of sensor nodes, which can be useful in robotics applications. 
3. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper mentions security surveillance as one of the long time monitoring applications of wireless sensor networks. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper discusses the need for an efficient algorithm for accurate localization of sensor nodes, which can be achieved through a combination of strategies. 
5. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper mentions habitat monitoring as one of the long time monitoring applications of wireless sensor networks, which can involve computer vision techniques.
